course.introduction: 工程地质学（engineering geology）研究与人类工程建筑等活动有关的地质问题的科学。地质学的一个分支学科。研究目的是查明建设地区或建筑场地的工程地质条件，预测和评价可能发生的工程地质问题及对建筑物或地质环境的影响，提出防治措施，以保证工程建设的正常进行。
course.introductionEn: Engineering geology is the application of the geological sciences to engineering study for the purpose of assuring that the geological factors regarding the location, design, construction, operation and maintenance of engineering works are recognized and accounted for. Engineering geologists provide geological and geotechnical recommendations, analysis, and design associated with human development and various types of structures. The realm of the engineering geologist is essentially in the area of earth-structure interactions, or investigation of how the earth or earth processes impact human made structures and human activities.
course.designateTextbook: 无
course.referenceTextbook: "王思敬, 中国工程地质学,科学出版社张咸恭，工程地质学，地质出版社罗国煜、李生林主编，工程地质学基础，南京大学出版社李智毅等，工程地质学概论，中国地质大学出版社张倬元等，工程地质分析原理，地质出版社胡广韬等，工程地质学，地质出版社Christopher C. Mathewson, Engineering Geology, Charles E. Merrill Publishing Company"

The content includes a comprehensive exposure to principles, strategies and methodologies of proteomics and metabolomics, including experiment design, sample preparation, analytical techniques and data analysis. Recent progresses and a variety of research applications of proteomics and metabolomics are also covered.

course.introduction: 科技文献阅读在科研活动中占有十分关键的地位，贯穿科研活动的整个过程。文献资料构筑了领域的研究背景，为科研工作奠定研究基础。阅读参考文献的主要目的就是提升学术水平，把握学术观点，学习技术方法， 以及积累研究素材。本课程内容包括如何正确取舍参考文献，将泛读与精读相结合，追踪阅读历史文献，通过对比分析和思考，形成自己的思路。同时，本课程将通过实践的方式，致力于掌握科技文献阅读的基本要求和技能，并提升研究者的报告和演讲能力。
course.introductionEn: Scientific literature reading plays a very crucial role in research activities throughout the entire process. Literature builds the research background and lays the foundation for scientific research. The main purpose of scientific literature reading is to enhance research abilities, assure academic points, technologies and methods, as well as the accumulation of research materials. This course covers how to choose the correct references, combine extensive and intensive reading, trace historical documents, and form own ideas through comparative analysis and reflection. Additionally, this course will, by practicing, commit to master the basic requirements and skills of scientific reading, and to enhance report and presentation skills of investigators.
course.designateTextbook: 根据课程设计和教学内容，无合适的现成教材

course.introduction:
《机器人设计与制作》是一门综合性课程，旨在培养学生在机器人设计与制作方面的理论知识和实践技能。课程内容涵盖机器人系统的基本组成、传感器与驱动器、控制系统、机械结构设计以及编程实现等方面。

本课程分为课堂授课与RoboGame机器人大赛设计制作实践两部分，通过赛教结合方式提高学生们的创新思维和动手实践能力。选课同学须在选课之前组队报名参加当年度的中科大RoboGame机器人大赛。
course.introductionEn:
《Robot Design and Production》is a comprehensive course aimed at cultivating students' theoretical knowledge and practical skills in robot design and production. The course content covers the basic components of robot systems, sensors and drivers, control systems, mechanical structure design, and programming implementation.

This course is divided into two parts: classroom teaching and RoboGame robot competition design and production practice. Through a combination of competition and teaching, students can improve their innovative thinking and hands-on practical skills. Students who choose this course must team up and register for the current year's RoboGame Robotics Competition at the University of Science and Technology of China before selecting courses.
course.referenceTextbook: 《机器人学导论》（原书第3版），（美）John J. Craig著，贠超 等译，2006年 机械工业出版社出版。

course.introductionEn: Comprehensive software experiment integrates the key knowledge of different courses (such as operating system, database, software engineering etc.) by making students to implement a comprehensive software, on one hand, training students’ practical ability, on the other hand, let the students experience the application of theoretical knowledge in software from the practical process, in turn, understanding of the theory of knowledge from practice angle.

course.introduction: 该课程由计算机应用技术方面的专家讲授，介绍该方面最前沿的知识。
course.introductionEn:
Recent advances in database technology along with the phenomenal growth of the Internet have resulted in an explosion of data collected, stored, and disseminated by various organizations. Because of its massive size, it is difficult for analysts to sift through the data even though it may contain useful information. Data mining holds great promise to address this problem by providing efficient techniques to uncover useful information hidden in the large data repositories.
　　The key objectives of this course are two-fold: (1) to teach the fundamental concepts of data mining and (2) to provide extensive hands-on experience in applying the concepts to real-world applications. The core topics to be covered in this course include classification, clustering, association analysis, and anomaly/novelty detection. Sudents who will be responsible for developing and/or applying data mining techniques to applications such as network intrusion detection, Web usage analysis, business/financial data analysis, text mining, bioinformatics, systems management, Earth Science, and other scientific and engineering areas. At the end of this course, students are expected to possess the fundamental skills needed to conduct their own research in data mining or to apply data mining techniques to their own research fields.

course.introductionEn: This is a practical course in computer science on solving application problems using computer programming, which deepens students’ understanding of problem solving and programming and improves students’ ability to write some large programs to solve several application problems, based on several classical topics of practical training.

course.introduction: 现代社会是个高度复杂的互联世界，这种连接性随处可见，如互联网，微博关注关系，QQ群，企业间的关系，国家之间的关系等。网络中个体的自发行为微妙地影响他个体，如何刻画和理解这些现象，是现代科学研究的热点。不同学科领域从不同的角度，采用不同的技术方法来刻画互联的网络结构及其行为特征。本课程从图论、博弈和市场经济三个不同的角度给学生介绍这一新领域的发展，培养学生从“计算思维”的角度去理解博弈与市场经济的技术方法在网络中的应用。

mngtDepartment.jmRemark: 预科生：谢老师 63602251老图书馆2２７室； 军训与军事理论：刑老师 63606080 东区老图书馆410室 junxing@ustc.edu.cn

course.introduction: 物联网技术将人类生存的物理世界网络化、信息化，将分离的物理世界和信息空间互联整合，代表了未来网络的发展方向。物联网技术称为未来社会经济发展、社会进步和科技创新的重要基础设施。本课程的目的是使学生掌握物联网技术的定义和基本原理及应用，了解物联网技术的发展，了解物联网的关键技术和方法。其中包括：物联网基本概念，物联网体系结构；物联网关键技术：射频技术、传感器及检测技术、无线传感器网网络、无线通信技术、数据融合技术、云计算技术等。
course.introductionEn: The Internet of Things (IoT), is the network of physical objects or "things" embedded with electronics, software, sensors, and network connectivity, which enables these objects to collect and exchange data. IoT allows objects to be sensed and controlled remotely across existing network infrastructure, creating opportunities for more direct integration between the physical world and computer-based systems, and resulting in improved efficiency, accuracy and economic benefit. IoT technology is the infrastructure for the future of social and economic development. Moreover, it is the infrastructure of social progress and technological innovation.  The main purpose of this course is to explain the basics of IoT technology , as well as, the basic principles and applications of IoT. In addition, this course explores the main techniques and methods to study IoT.  Including what follows: The basic concepts of IoT and IoT architecture as well as the main technology of IoT, which includes radio frequency technology, sensors and detection technology, wireless sensor mesh networks, wireless communication technology, data fusion technology, and cloud computing technology.
course.designateTextbook: 《物联网导论》刘云浩编著，科学出版社
course.referenceTextbook: "[1]《RFID与物联网:射频、中间件、解析与服务》.宁焕生编著.电子工业出版社.2008。[2]《无线传感器网络简明教程》.崔逊学，左从菊编著.清华大学出版社,2009.[3]《射频识别(RFID)原理与应用》.单承赣,单玉峰,姚磊编著. 电子工业出版社,2008.[4]《现代无线通信技术》.邬正义、范瑜、徐惠钢. 高等教育出版社.2008[5]《物联网概论》，黄玉兰著，人民邮电出版社，2011年。"

course.introduction: "本课程强调趣味性，实用性和科学性相结合，将化学实验应用到日常饮食，家居，医疗，美容，化工等方方面面，使学生在享受化学乐趣的同时，进一步感悟化学原理，并应用所学化学知识对生活和社会中的化学问题作出正确的判断和解释；同时以科研实验室中的标准操作方法训练学生，使其提早了解和掌握基本测试仪器的使用，以补充基础实验课程中欠缺之处，为其今后的科研训练打下基础。采取2～3人/组的形式，学生自由选取教师给出的备选研究课题，经过文献查阅，调研并与教师讨论后，自主设计实验方案，进行实验操作，总结实验结果，交流实验心得，完"

course.introduction: 该课程选取中国文化中一些最具特色的内容和亮点，如饮食，中医，节日，旅游，建筑，音乐，戏剧，书法，国画，生肖，功夫，哲学等方面，通过阅读典型的事例和材料使学生比较具体和深入的了解中国文化精神，在交流中能够用英语将中国文化介绍给外国人。
course.introductionEn: The course focuses on the topics featuring Chinese culture such as Food, Medicine, Festivals, Travelling, Architecture, Music, Opera, Calligraphy, Painting, Zodiac, Kongfu, and Philosophy,  etc. Students learn about the above in depth through reading relevant materials so as to be able to introduce Chinese culture to foreigners in English.

course.introduction: 课程集英美文学欣赏结合人文素质教育，通过解读莎士比亚两部伟大悲剧作品：《哈姆雷特》与《李尔王》，分析现代年轻一代所肩负的责任与义务，帮助年轻以更成熟稳健的心态面对今日之社会生活的困惑与压力。
course.introductionEn: An attempt to combine Medieval English Literature with humanity education, this course focuses on two of Shakespeare’s greatest tragedies, Hamlet and King Lear with the hope of shedding some light for the younger generation on how to face courageously the burdens and pressures in life.
course.designateTextbook: "《哈姆雷特》（Hamlet）。Ann Thompson北京：中国人民大学出版社（影印版），2008.《李尔王》（King Lear）。R.A.Foakes, 北京：中国人民大学出版社（影印版），2008."

mngtDepartment.jmRemark: 预科生：谢老师 63602251老图书馆2２７室； 军训与军事理论：刑老师 63606080 东区老图书馆410室 junxing@ustc.edu.cn

course.introduction: “化学原理C”是为非化学专业本科生开设的通修课程，侧重于化学的基本原理和基本知识，兼顾化学的学科交叉。从物质的状态及其转化入手，阐述化学定量研究的发展。由此，介绍化学反应的类型（无机化学反应、有机化学反应、聚合反应和超分子化学），阐述化学反应的基本规律（化学反应热力学、化学反应动力学和化学反应平衡）。介绍原子和分子结构的基本理论，从微观角度解析化学反应的本质。
course.introductionEn: The course of Chemistry Principle is specially given to the undergraduates whose major is not chemistry. It is mainly concerned with in the fundamental principles and basic knowledge of chemistry, as well as the cross-discipline with other science. Beginning with substance states and their inter-transition, the development of quantitative chemistry is introduced. Then, the chemical reactions (inorganic, organic, polymeric and supermolecular) are offered and the three chemical theories of chemical thermodynamic, chemical kinetic and chemical equilibrium is elucidated. Based on the principles of atom structure and molecule structure, the microscopic origination of chemistry is discussed.
course.designateTextbook: 《普通化学原理》   第四版 华彤文    北京大学出版社 2013年7月9日
course.referenceTextbook: "1. Chemistry —The Central Science，7th Edition，T. L. Brown。2. Principles of Chemical Science，MIT公开课程"

course.introduction: 本课程为从事天文地球动力学、空间大地测量学等领域的专业课，也可作为天文学以及相关地球科学专业的选修课。本书主要论述了用天文手段测定和研究地球各种运动状态及其力学机制。研究的运动是地球整体的自转和公转运动，以及地球各圈层（大气圈、水圈、地壳、地幔和地核）的物质运动。所涉及的力学机制是地球自转变化的机理以及它与地球各圈层物质运动变化的相互作用与成因机理。通过本课程的学习，希望学生能掌握当代各种空间技术对地观测的原理、各种观测数据处理的方法、地球整体与各圈层物质运动的基本机理，为进一步学习和从事空间对地观测及其在地球科学的应用研究打下基础。
course.introductionEn: nothing
course.designateTextbook: 叶叔华、黄 珹等，天文地球动力学，山东科学技术出版社，济南，2001

course.introduction: 工艺技术与工艺工具、设备的不断进步，以及超净室的控制使得半导体工艺技术在近十年来发展迅速。为了实现超低功耗及不同功能、性能极佳的集成电路，对于复杂工艺、先进制造技术、尖端技术、新型器件、新材料等的关注，对于半导体技术的持续创新与相关方向的未来发展则十分重要。
course.introductionEn: The continuous advancement in process techniques, processing tools and equipment, as well as cleanroom control have enabled the semiconductor process technologies to advance rapidly over the last few decades. To realize integrated circuits (ICs) with ultra-low-power and superb performance while achieving the varied functionalities, the appreciation of complex processes, advanced fabrication techniques, state-of-the-art technologies, novel devices, new materials etc., are crucial; for the continuation of semiconductor technological invention and also further development in the areas.

course.introduction: 本学期课程主要针对（迷你）CPU设计，包括逻辑设计，FPGA上Verilog建模和综合，指令集架构，CPU设计实用方法，单周期PIC16F54设计，中断加入，汇编码和Verilog编码协同设计及验证，FPGA板简单应用的实测，FPGA中CPU速度优化方法，pipeline CPU设计方法。
course.introductionEn: Taking PIC16F54 as an example, this (mini-) CPU design course includes quick review of logic design and Verilog modeling and synthesis in FPGA, Instruction Set Architecture, practical methods of CPU design, single cycle design, Interrupt addition, assembly code and Verilog code co-design and co-verification, real testing in the FPGA board for simple applications, speed optimization for CPU in FPGA, and in the last, introduction to pipeline CPU design. The key feature of this course is to teach students build up a complete CPU and its application with S/W development.

course.introduction: 本课程是以通俗易懂的方式把理论物理相关领域的发展以及一些前沿问题较为系统地进行介绍，其目的是让高年级本科生在决定今后自己的研究前能对相关领域有一定深度的了解。本课程有一个20学时的简化版和一个40学时的加强版，具体讲授内容由理论物理学科讲授老师的研究领域决定。比如“从粒子物理到弦理论”将介绍粒子物理、基本相互作用、量子场论、孤子特性、弦与膜以及M－理论的相关方面和一些近期进展。
course.introductionEn: This is an introduction course in theoretical physics, whose aim is to prepare students in their earlier stage to have some good knowledge of certain subject in this field so that they can make wise decision to continue their study toward advanced degree. This course has two versions: 20-hour simplified one and 40-hour enhanced one and the actual lecture context is determined by who is teaching this course from the theory group in USTC. For example, “From particle physics to string theory” includes introductions to particle physics, elementary interactions, quantum field theory, solitons, strings and branes as well as M-theory and its recent development among other things.

course.introduction: 本课程共20讲，授课语言为英文。我们首先考虑自由波色弦，通过光锥规范和BRST两种方法量子化。我们会引进共性场论的方法，之后介绍超对称弦的Neveu-Schwarz-Ramond量子化方法。下一步是介绍弦的散射理论。我们会考虑树图和一圈图的微扰论。最后，我们引进超弦的纯旋量量子化，以及在该框架下的散射微扰论。
course.introductionEn: "Superstring perturbation theory：This is an intense two-week crash course on string perturbation with 20 lectures. We will begin with the quantization of the free bosonic string in Minkowskian space-time, first in lightcone gauge, and then in BRST formalism. Basic techniques of two-dimensional conformal field theory will be introduced along the way. We then quantize the free superstring in Neveu-Schwarz-Ramond formalism. Next, we will formulate string perturbation theory from the worldsheet perspective, and learn how to compute tree level and one loop scattering amplitudes. Finally, we introduce the pure spinor formalism of superstrings.The prerequisites of this course are quantum field theory and generality, or the ability to learn quickly. No prior knowledge of string theory or conformal field theory is required. There will be a short homework assignment at the end of each day. The homework is a crucial part of the course, and should be completed in a timely manner. "
course.designateTextbook: Polchinski， 《String Theory》, Volume I and II

研究生（30）人。与北京大学马伯强教授与理论物理研究所马建平研究员合作授课。马伯强教授长期从事高能物理理论的研究，在强子结构和自旋物理方面有重要贡献。2000年获得国家杰出青年基金资助。 2001年起为理论物理长江特聘教授。2004年获中国物理学会周培源物理奖。马建平研究员主要从事粒子物理理论前沿的研究。在CP破坏，强相互作用及量子色动力学和应用，格点量子色动力学，并作出了重要成果。1999年获得国家杰出青年基金资助。

Then we introduce the concept of canonical quantization for scalar, vector and spinor fields. The basic knowledge about perturbation method and Feynman diagram technique are also discussed. Finally we introduce a few concepts in high energy nuclear physics.

course.introduction: 科学计量学是一门较为崭新的学科，它运用科学数据、数学方法、理论模型对科学的各个方面和整体进行定量化研究和评估，从微观、中观、宏观等层面揭示科学自身和各种支撑要素的发展规律。该课程的主要内容将由科学计量学基本概念、三大经典规律、常见分析指标、影响因子与期刊评价、H类指数、文献耦合与同被引分析、马修效应与马修迹象、各类全新评价方法、与同行评议关系、在实践中的应用等十个部分组成。课程还将结合具体案例讲授若干发表在资讯科学（Information Science）领域权威杂志上的最新研究成果。通过该课程的学习，可以使得学生全面了解科学计量学的基本知识，深入领会引文分析的真谛，逐步掌握学术评估（即判断期刊、论著、学者、机构等的学术水平）的基本手段。
course.introductionEn: Scientometrics is a newly emerging subject. The course consists of several parts as follows: the basic concepts of sientomrtics, three classical principles, index of routine analysis, impact factor and journal evaluation, H-index, bibliographic coupling and co-citation analysis, Matthew Effect and Matthew Phenomenon, truly original approaches, the relationship between the peer review and the quantitative evaluation, application and practice, etc. The course also introduces the latest research achievements in information science. Having followed this course, students should understand the basic knowledge of scientometrics, grasp the true meaning of citation analysis, and master the methods of the measurement of research performance.
course.designateTextbook: 自编讲义《科学计量学》，吴强。
course.referenceTextbook: "1.[荷]亨克.F.莫德著，佟贺丰等译，《科研评价中的引文分析》。北京：科学技术文献出版社，2010年第1版。2. Michael S. Rosenberg. A Biologist’s Guide to Impact Factors. School of Life Sciences, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ 85287‐4501.3. Nicola De Bellis. Bibliometrics and Citation Analysis: From the Science Citation Index to Cybermetrics. The Scarecrow Press Inc., 2009.4.袁军鹏，《科学计量学高级教程》。科学技术文献出版社，2010年第1版。5.梁立明、武夷山等著，《科学计量学：理论探讨与案例研究》。北京：科学出版社，2006年第1版。"

course.introduction: 物理化学III是一门横跨物理化学多个分支的综合课程，结合介绍现代计算机化学及其在生物化学、材料科学、环境化学等研究课题方面的应用。课程突出强调物理化学的基本概念及其内在的紧密相互关系，注重解决实际问题的思路与能力。课程重点介绍量子力学基础、变分法、微扰理论、分子轨道理论、密度泛函理论、基函数、电子相关等一系列量子化学概念与方法，同时介绍分子光谱、统计力学、热力学、反应动力学等分支学科中的基本内容与重要概念，最后介绍计算机化学在蛋白质和DNA结构、大气污染及环境化学研究中的一些应用实例。课程全程用英语授课，学生作业与考试全部使用英语。
course.introductionEn: Physical Chemistry III is an integrated course that covers all major topics of modern physical chemistry along with modern computational chemistry and applications in current research areas, including biochemistry, material science, and environmental chemistry. The course focuses on fundamental concepts and internal relationships among various topics of physical chemistry as well as on practical skills and techniques in solving research problems. The course selectively gives in-depth lectures as well as highlights on quantum mechanics, variational methods, perturbation theory, molecular orbital theory, density functional theory, basis set, electron correlation, computational methods and techniques, molecular spectroscopy, statistical mechanics, thermodynamics, intermolecular forces, applications of computational chemistry in protein and DNA structures and in air pollution and other environmental problems. All lectures are delivered in English. Homework assignments and exams are given in English and are expected to be completed in English.
course.designateTextbook: “Quantum Chemistry”5th Ed. by I.N. Levine， Prentice Hall, New Jersey
course.referenceTextbook: "“Essentials of Computational Chemistry” 2nd Ed. by C. Cramer, Wiley“Physical Chemistry”6th Edition, by I.N. Levine, McGraw-Hill"

course.introduction: 本课程介绍功能材料类型、固体中的原子键合、晶体结构和表征、晶体缺陷和固体中的扩散、材料的电性能、材料的热性能、材料的机械性能、材料的弹性和塑性变形、相图（尤其是铁相图及其应用）、金属材料的氧化和腐蚀等。
course.introductionEn: This course provides an overview of the relationship of processing/structure/property of the major types of functional materials. The following contents are covered: the nature of bonding and crystalline structures in solids and how they relate to the macroscopic behavior, imperfections in crystals and diffusion process in materials, electrical and thermal properties of materials, mechanical behavior and deformation mechanisms in materials, phase diagram and phase transformation (with emphasis on the fundamentals and applications of the iron-carbon phase diagram), and oxidation and corrosion of metals.
course.designateTextbook: Introduction to Materials Science for Engineers, 7th Edition; Author: James Shackelford; Publisher: Prentice Hall; ISBN-10: 0136012604; ISBN-13: 978-0136012603

course.introduction: 信息科技日新月异，计算机仿真不但是研究物理的工具，也成为找寻与设计新材料的一大利器。本课程要以每周一个独立单元的明快进度，向学生们介绍如何利用最先进的材料计算计算机仿真软件与3D交互式图形接口来预测材料的性质。内容涵盖传统固态物理学之材料的晶体结构、能带结构、机械性质、电学性质、光学性质、磁学性质等重要主题，同时兼顾科技应用及广度，可协助学生培养研究的基础及提升就业的竞争力。
course.introductionEn: This course introduces the density functional theory and its applications. It is organized by three parts as follows: 1) Fundamental theory: establishing the Kohn-Sham equation,introducing the basic concepts, such as the supercell, fractional occupied state, the projected density of states, band structure, Brillouin zone and k sampling, etc 2) Modeling: Constructing computational models of supercell, doped crystals, crystals with defects to study the impact of impurities and defects on materials performance; Building surface structure through the vacuum layer structure to study surface adsorption and reconstruction.3) Applications: Using CASTEP program to calculate physical quantities such as atomic orbital, molecular structure, chemical bond orders, bond energy, surface reconstruction, work function, cell parameter and density of states. The impact of pseudo-potential choice,regulations of important parameters, accuracy and convergence test on the calculation results are also introduced.
course.referenceTextbook:

course.introduction: 核磁共振技术是现代制药工业中小分子结构解析的核心手段。通过学习本课程，使学生了解核磁共振波谱学的基本原理，以及在药物发现中应用核磁共振技术的基本方法，并结合具体实例而加以阐明。为以后在化学研究中结合他们的具体工作使用核磁共振技术打下基础。
course.introductionEn: Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) is a major technique in elucidating the structure of chemical compounds in modern pharmaceutical industry. This course offers an opportunity for students to learn the major aspects of NMR technique, including basic theory, experimental pulse sequences, and applications in drug discovery. Specific example will be provided in the course study.
course.designateTextbook: 自编教材
course.referenceTextbook: NMR Spectroscopy Explained: Simplified Theory, Applications and Examples for Organic Chemistry and Structural Biology, by Neil E Jacobsen, John Wiley & Sons. Inc.

course.introduction: "本课程是一门面向学科前沿的专业基础课程，主要分为两部分：统计力学系综部分和量子统计动力学部分。系综部分包括系综的概念、主要系综和热力学、近独立子系统、晶体热容、量子气体、非理想气体、相变系统(铁磁系统)、分子力学和Monte Carlo介绍等。量子统计动力学部分包括密度矩阵与刘维尔方程、希尔伯特空间和刘维尔空间量子动力学、相关函数与响应函数、涨落耗散定理、多维非线性光谱基础等。预修要求：统计热力学基础，量子力学基础面向对象：高年级本科生及研究生"

course.introduction: 本课程要求学生掌握MATLAB的数据类型、矩阵输入和操作方法；自定义函数的编写、调试与优化；常用数学函数的使用；待分析数据的各种可视化方法；能够编写用户图形界面，并能够熟练地将MATLAB应用于学习中，解决相关课程中的数学计算及仿真。
course.introductionEn: This course requires students to master the data types, matrix inputs, and operation methods of MATLAB; Writing, debugging and optimization of custom functions; the use of common mathematical functions; various visualization methods of the data to be analyzed; Ability to write graphical user interfaces and be proficient in applying MATLAB to solve mathematical calculations and simulations in related courses.
course.remark: 老课号：210M08 2020秋变更   2022.3.31修改评分制五分制为二分制

course.introduction: 物联网导论是一门关于感知识别、网络构建、管理服务和综合应用的课程，包括自动识别技术与RFID、传感器技术、定位系统、智能信息设备、无线宽带网络、无线低速网络、移动通信网络、数据库管理系统、海量信息存储、搜索引擎、智能决策、信息安全与隐私保护和应用前景等。
course.introductionEn: A course on the perception identification, network construction, management services and integrated applications, including automatic identification technology and RFID, sensor technology, positioning system, intelligent information equipment, wireless broadband network, wireless low-speed network, mobile communication network, database management system, massive information storage, search engine, intelligent decision, information security and privacy protection, and application prospects.
course.referenceTextbook: "1. 《物联网工程概论》，王志良、王粉花，机械工业出版社，20112. 《物联网技术导论》，王汝传、孙力娟，清华大学出版社，2011"

courseCategory.name: 素能拓展课程

course.introduction:
机械图样是人们进行技术思想交流的工具，是工程技术人员的共同语言。作为高层次的工程技术人才，必须具备画图和读图的能力，而本课程就是培养这种能力的技术基础课程，通过本课程的学习，学生将具备空间逻辑思维能力和创造性构型设计能力，掌握绘图、读图的基本技能。本课程还将在教学中引入计算机辅助绘图和三维建模技术，以期学生能够熟练掌握这一门作为现代设计不可或缺的基本技术，以适应现代设计的需要。还要使学生通过本课程的学习培养良好的工程意识和认真细致的工作作风。本课程内容：

①介绍绘制机械图样必须遵循的国家标准；

②介绍机械图样生成的原理（投影原理）、内容和表达方法；

③介绍三维实体模型和二维视图的作用；

④介绍计算机辅助绘图软件AutoCAD的使用，使学生掌握计算机绘图和标注的技能。
course.introductionEn:
Design is a kind of creative activities to solve the problem by human’s wisdom and skills. An engineering drawing is used to fully and clearly define requirements for engineered items. Engineering drawings is also a language—a graphical language that communicates ideas and information from one mind to another. The popularization and development of computer technology have brought great revolutionary change for the engineering design. Computer-aided drawing (CAD) is the most basic link and has played a decisive role. Its application is more and more widely. As soon as possible to apply CAD into professional and life of students, will add gorgeous colors to their work and daily life. The course contents include: (1) Introducing the role of 3D entity modeling and the 2D drafting; (2) Explaining the mechanism of mechanical drawings generation (projection principle and expression method, and the rules of the national standard. (3) Demonstrating the usage of AutoCAD and enable students to master the skills to plot the engineering drawing. (4) Introducing Chinese national standards about the mechanical design.

Teaching mode: paperless teaching.
course.designateTextbook: "1.自行开发的基于web的多媒体全课程教程。2.AutoCAD软件。 "
course.referenceTextbook: 机械制图（第七版）同济大学等院校编，何铭新等主编，高等教育出版社。
